attributes.action: Fine media companies for inciting panic regarding 'fuel shortage.
attributes.additional_details: To stop media companies getting away with causing panic and distress to the public.
attributes.background: This is not the first time the media is to be blamed for inciting panic amongst the public, we are all aware of how much panic they caused during the covid 19 pandemic in regards to 'food shortages'. They must be held accountable.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the content of media reporting.
